H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H6442.def: = a reference to the inside of an object

H2691.def: = collection of dwellings, not surrounded by a wall

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H490.def: = woman whose husband has died and therefore has difficulty caring for herself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

H1644.def: = process by which large bodies of water move back and forth as a result of natural forces

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H1330.def: = young unmarried woman, who has never been married before, and has never had sex with a man

H2233.def: = a flowering plant’s unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant, in some cases also used as food

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H2455.def: = something that is accessible to ordinary people without preceding ritual

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H2889.def: = state in which an object is free from dirt, contamination and everything else that is not supposed to be present

H2931.def: = state in which humans, animals, or objects are regarded by the law as having been contaminated, ► as a result of which they cannot participate in social and religious activities

H7379.def: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8104.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H8451.def: = causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

H2708.def: = patterns of behavior that a community expects its members to follow

H4150.def: = an action by which two or more parties come together for a particular purpose

H7676.def: = the seventh day of the week, which is a day of rest during which the people are not to do any work

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H2930.def: = process by which humans, or objects are or become contaminated, ◄ as a result of contagious diseases or conditions, unlawful activities, or contact with what has been contaminated, ► which often results in their inability of being used or participating in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H517.def: = direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H269.def: = daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H2893.def: = process by which people become free from contamination, ► as a result of which they can interact socially with others

H7651.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark
= the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H6442.def: = a reference to the inside of an object

H2691.def: = collection of dwellings, not surrounded by a wall

H7126.def: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H3069.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5159.def: = process by which possessions are transferred from one generation to the next

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H272.def: = state of ownership of land, including any buildings and population centers located on it, or slaves

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H4503.def: = objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient

H817.def: = state of being responsible for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H2764.def: = long net hanging vertically in the water with floats at the upper edge and weights at the lower edge; ► drawn in by men working in boats or from shore; as the ends are drawn together to the boat or drawn ashore, fish are trapped in the area enclosed by the net; drawn in immediately after it has been spread out; ≈ associated with aggression and control

H7225.def: = point in time at which an event starts happening

H1061.def: = the earliest agricultural outcomes of the season; ► with an important function in the religious offerings system; ≈ often with a religious connotation

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H1293.def: = action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

H5117.def: = action by which humans or animals stop their current or regular activities, ► often with the purpose of recovering their strength

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H929.def: often used as collective: = general term for any land animal, as opposed to {L:humans<SDBH:אָדָם>}, {L:birds<SDBH:עֹוף>}, {L:reptiles<SDBH:רֶמֶשׂ>}, {L:insects<SDBH:שֶׁרֶץ>}, and {L:fish<SDBH:דָּג>}

H5038.def: = the dead body of humans or animals

H2966.def: literally: what is torn apart; hence: = slain victim of a carnivorous animal; ≈ associated with a violent death, bloodshed, and frequently used as a metaphor for victims of warfare
